entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
